mapper.select:
select a.id,a.name,b.nickname,a.create_time,a.user_id,a.memo from ljcx_team_info a left join account_user_base b on a.user_id = b.id
and a.id in (select team_id from ljcx_team_relationship where m_id = #{item.userId} and m_type = 3) and a.is_delete = 1
select a.id team_id,a.name,b.nickname,a.create_time,a.user_id,a.memo ,a.im_group_id,a.im_group_name from ljcx_team_info a left join account_user_base b on a.user_id = b.id where a.id = #{id};

select (case m_type when 1 then 'uavCount' when 2 then 'carCount' when 3 then 'memberCount' end) `name` ,count(1) `value` from ljcx_team_relationship a
and a.team_id = #{teamId}
and a.team_id in (select team_id from ljcx_team_relationship where m_type = 3 and m_id = #{userId})
group by a.m_type

SELECT distinct a.id,a.name,(select nickname from account_user_base where id = a.user_id) nickname,a.create_time,a.user_id,a.memo ,a.pid,a.path,false 'canSelect',a.user_id = #{item.userId} 'isAdmin' FROM ljcx_team_info a,ljcx_team_info b where b.id in (select team_id from ljcx_team_relationship where m_id = #{item.userId} and m_type = 3) and b.path like CONCAT(a.path,'/%') UNION SELECT distinct b.id,b.name,(select nickname from account_user_base where id = b.user_id) nickname,b.create_time,b.user_id,b.memo ,b.pid,b.path,true 'canSelect',a.user_id = #{item.userId} 'isAdmin' FROM ljcx_team_info a,ljcx_team_info b where a.id in (select team_id from ljcx_team_relationship where m_id = #{item.userId} and m_type = 3) and b.path like CONCAT(a.path,'%')
select count(1) from ljcx_team_relationship where team_id = #{teamId};
